name: @browser-style/design-tokens-exporter
description: W3C-compliant design token to CSS custom properties exporter

scripts.export: node -e "import { exportFromFile } from './exportTokensToCSS.js'; await exportFromFile('./design.tokens.json', { fileName: './design.tokens.css', layer: 'design-tokens', selector: ':root' });"
scripts.preview: echo 'Open tokens-preview.html in your browser to see the tokens in action'
